column2: Position Title: Associate, Video Editor Location: Mohali Position Type: Regular, Full-Time We are looking for a Video Editor to edit and stylize all content, across multiple platforms and formats in tune with Roundglass' wavelength of wellness. This individual is well-versed or keenly interested in issues concerning Womens Wellness, brand consistency, and meaningful measurement. The position collaborates with the departments of production, solutions, communications, design, IT across the RoundGlass ecosystem to help define both the brand story and the story as interpreted by the customer. What   youll   do: ??Build and publish content on the CMS. ??Copy edits all food-related content as well as pitch in on all newsletters, content, and social media. ??Planning and scheduling content for publishing and updating content tracker. ??Write copy for banners, collections, metatext, heds/decks. ??New Recipes: work with developers, testers, nutritionists, and visual team. Manage a team  of freelancers. ??Make and track requests for images and publishing. ??Work with/manage freelance writers and illustrators for an ingredient encyclopedia. ??Update and rotate content on app and site via CMS. ??Leverage existing content for thematic collections highlighting nutritional and wellness  topics ??Curate content and create headlines for banners ??Review content with our nutritionist to ensure published content is accurate ??Content strategy with the nutritionist ??Work with Product on troubleshooting/reporting CMS issues. ??Work on team goal setting and reporting of goals throughout the year including publishing  progress reports and analysis. Who   we??e   looking   for: ??5+ years of direct experience writing ??Food and wellbeing-specific script writing experience ??Personable communication skills, ability to put experts at ease to bring their best ideas and work. ??Excellent command of language ??Ability to work flexible hours for occasional early morning or late-night calls (to accommodate international time zones) ??Fast writing skills for quick turnaround times. Why   RoundGlass: RoundGlass was built on the vision that wellbeing should be at the very center of our life journey. We are not only reimagining how the world experiences wellbeing, but how companies (like our own) support the wellbeing of their people. We??e a group of talented, socially conscious, gritty, innovators using technology and human energy to create a vibrant wellness ecosystem. Together, we??e built an amazing community, and we are always looking for people who share our passion.   We   are   an   equal   opportunity   employer   and   value   diversity   at   our   company. column2: The Ideal candidate will be someone who thrives in a fast paced environment, is adept at managing multiple projects and has an exceptional knack of telling stories     The person will have a proven track record in producing engaging and informative brand content         Job      responsibilities:           Owns video content production and post production for EB at LK         Uses his/her/their creative flair to tell compelling stories through video content.         Maintains high standards of video quality and accuracy, ensuring that all content adheres to LK s brand guidelines and EVP.         Collaborates with internal teams to develop campaigns aimed at providing a positive experience to talent.           Job Requirements             Should be a graduate (preferably in Communication)         Should have 2 years & above experience of working with video content for a similar brand (tech/ D2C/ fashion etc)         Familiarity with onground photoshoot execution and tech equipment handling         Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or Audacity         Hands-on experience in using edit tools available on social media to make reels, YouTube shorts, etc         Basic understanding of social media channels and performance (Linkedin, Instagram, X)

column2: We are looking for someone with a strong mix of digital design skills, art direction and the ability to interpret the wider business needs of the broad range of clients we work with.      You will need a strong eye for detail, a desire to innovate and enjoy pushing the boundaries of design.      You will need to be a team player and get stuck in from day one.      This is a full-time role (9.00am to 5.00pm) based in an open and relaxed environment at our office.      The space is open 24/7 for anyone that wants to use it.      As the Senior Digital Designer, you will work alongside our Head of Design, two Mid-weight Designers and the Client Services Team.      Your key role will be to design websites, advertising formats for social media and display campaigns, email, branding, storyboarding and art direction for animation and video production as well as creating engaging concepts for client pitches.      You will collaborate with the whole agency in order to plan, create and execute campaigns.
column11: Digital design, Social media, Analytical, Animation, HTML, Digital marketing, Internship, Analytics

column2: Bachelor's degree (Preferably in communications, media studies, marketing, or a related field)        Strong written and verbal communication skills, with exceptional attention to detail and grammar.        Creativity and a passion for storytelling, with the ability to translate complex ideas into engaging video scripts.        Proficiency in research and the ability to gather information from various sources to support script development.        Knowledge of video production processes and familiarity with video editing software (eg, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) is a plus.        Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.        A proactive and self-motivated attitude, with a willingness to learn and adapt to new challenges.            Key Responsibilities:          Collaborate with the marketing team to develop compelling video concepts and scripts that effectively communicate the benefits of studying abroad through SIEC Education.      Conduct thorough research on study abroad destinations, universities, courses, and related topics to ensure accurate and up-to-date content.      Write clear, concise, and engaging video scripts tailored to our target audience, maintaining a consistent brand voice and messaging.      Work closely with social media content editors, and other team members to bring scripts to life through visually appealing and high-quality video content.      Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in video production and digital marketing to continually improve the effectiveness of our video content.      Assist in the planning and execution of video shoots, providing input on locations, props, and other creative elements as needed.      Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including counsellors and subject matter experts, to gather relevant information and insights for video content creation.
